Articles.Content:
So I launched a mission to the mun and back recently. There was no flaw in the mission- until i checked the flight statistics at the end. It turns out my kerbals withstood 44.2 g's! Then, that gave me an idea! Create a challenge about reentry g-force.

Objective:

Find out how much g force you can get on a ship upon reentry.

Rules:

Mods are allowed.

No hyperediting ships into the planet.

You may use any planet you want to get the maximum amount of g-force.

Give evidence that you did it (show pictures of the reentry and the statistics afterwards).

Leaderboard:

1: Zapness-44.2g

2:

3:

4:

5:

Good luck!

EDIT- I know i spelled g-force wrong in the title.

Edited July 31, 2013 by Zapness
You can edit the title, just click it in the forum-overview
